EmailTemplate.description: User announcements update for CSI 19 release
EmailTemplate.name: Upcoming Salesforce Changes CSI 19 sprint
EmailTemplate.subject: PLEASE READ: Update to commitments and office hold
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
This week's release includes bug fixes and performance improvements. In addition, this release contains changes to commitment terms and office holds.
Commitment terms Commitment terms will now be updated on your opportunities from member agreements.
Office hold You can now select offices to hold in salesforce.
Please select custom hold, located in the drop-down in the right corner
You will be brought to custom hold page. Please fill in your building, reservable, the date you would like to hold the office until and details for the hold.
When the form is complete, click save to submit the hold request.
Your office hold will notify the following team members for the building:
Regional Sales Manager Territory Sales Manager Cluster Sales Manager Cluster Sales Lead Portfolio Sales Manager Opportunity Team Members Community Lead Community Manager
If you have any questions or concerns, please reach out to salesforcesupport@wework.com
Warmly, Susie
